recipes.title: Classic Margarita
instructions: Rim the glass with salt.
In a shaker, combine tequila, lime juice, triple sec, and sugar.
Shake well and strain into the glass filled with ice.
Garnish with lime wedges.

recipes.title: Strawberry Mojito
instructions: In a glass, muddle strawberries, mint leaves, lime juice, and sugar.
Add rum and ice.
Top with club soda and stir gently.

recipes.title: Moscow Mule
instructions: Fill a copper mug or glass with ice.
Pour vodka and lime juice over the ice.
Top it off with ginger beer and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

recipes.title: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add vodka, cranberry juice, triple sec, and lime juice to the shaker.
Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds to chill the ingredients.
Strain the mixture into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lime twist or a few cranberries on a cocktail pick.

recipes.title: Fluffy Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve with your favorite toppings.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
In a bowl, mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture onto the toast.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes (if desired) and garnish with cilantro or basil.

recipes.title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: In a glass or bowl, layer Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries.
Repeat the layers until all the ingredients are used.
Drizzle with honey if desired.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipes.title: Egg and Cheese Breakfast Sandwich
ingredients: 2 slices cheese (cheddar, Swiss, or your choice)
instructions: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and melt some butter or spray with cooking spray.
Crack the eggs into the skillet and cook until the whites are set and the yolks are still slightly runny, or to your desired doneness. Season with salt and pepper.
Place a slice of cheese on each egg and continue cooking until the cheese melts.
Assemble the breakfast sandwich: Place a cooked egg with cheese on the bottom half of each toasted English muffin. Top with the other half of the muffin.
Serve warm and enjoy!

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Alternate slices of tomato and mozzarella on a serving plate.
Tuck basil leaves in between the tomato and mozzarella slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
instructions: Lay out the tortilla wraps and spread Caesar dressing evenly on each.
Place the shredded chicken, romaine lettuce, and Parmesan cheese in the center of each wrap.
Season with salt and pepper.
Fold in the sides of the wraps and roll tightly.
Slice in half and serve.

recipes.title: BLT Sandwich
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Spread mayonnaise on one side of each bread slice.
Layer lettuce leaves on one slice of bread.
Place tomato slices on top of the lettuce.
Season the tomatoes with salt and pepper.
Add cooked bacon slices on top of the tomatoes.
Cover with another slice of bread, mayonnaise side down.
Slice the sandwich diagonally or into halves, if desired.
Serve immediately and enjoy this classic BLT sandwich!

recipes.title: Chicken Salad Sandwich
instructions: In a bowl, combine shredded chicken, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, chopped fresh dill, diced celery, salt, and pepper.
Toast the bread slices, if desired.
Layer lettuce leaves on one slice of bread.
Place tomato slices on top of the lettuce.
Spoon the chicken salad mixture on top of the tomatoes.
Cover with another slice of bread.
Slice the sandwich in half, if desired.
Serve immediately and enjoy this flavorful Chicken Salad sandwich!

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium heat.
Add the onion and garlic, and cook until softened.
Stir in the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, beef broth, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti and garnish with Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter Sauce
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
In a small bowl, combine melted butter, lemon juice, minced garlic, dried dill, salt, and pepper.
Brush the salmon fillets with the butter mixture.
Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked to your desired doneness.
Remove from the grill and garnish with fresh parsley.

recipes.title: Mac and Cheese
instructions: Cook the elbow macaroni according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat.
Stir in the flour and cook for 1-2 minutes until lightly golden.
Gradually whisk in the milk and continue cooking until the mixture thickens.
Add the shredded cheddar cheese, salt, and black pepper. Stir until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth.
Remove the saucepan from heat and pour the cheese sauce over the cooked macaroni. Stir until the macaroni is evenly coated.
Serve immediately and enjoy your homemade mac and cheese!

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Coat chicken in beaten egg, then bread crumb mixture.
Cook chicken in olive oil until golden brown.
Top chicken with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until chicken is cooked and cheese is melted.
Serve with pasta or a side of your choice.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a large bowl, cream together butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture and mix well.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown.
Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.

recipes.title: Strawberry Shortcake
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsalted butter, cold and cubed
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Cut in the cold butter using a pastry cutter or your fingers until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Stir in the milk until just combined.
Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead gently a few times.
Pat the dough into a 1-inch thick rectangle and cut out shortcakes using a round biscuit cutter.
Place the shortcakes onto a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes or until golden brown.
Allow the shortcakes to cool slightly.
To assemble, split the shortcakes in half, top with sliced strawberries and whipped cream, then replace the top half of the shortcake.

recipes.title: No-Bake Oreo Cheesecake
instructions: In a bowl, combine the Oreo cookie crumbs and melted butter. Mix well until the crumbs are evenly coated.
Press the mixture into the bottom of a greased 9-inch pie dish or springform pan to form the crust.
In a separate bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth and creamy.
Add the powdered sugar and vanilla extract. Continue to beat until well combined.
Fold in the whipped cream until the mixture is smooth and fluffy.
Pour the cream cheese mixture over the Oreo crust in the pie dish, spreading it evenly.
Refrigerate the cheesecake for at least 4 hours, or until firm.
Before serving, decorate the top with additional Oreo cookies or cookie crumbs if desired.
Slice and enjoy this creamy and indulgent No-Bake Oreo Cheesecake!

recipes.title: Brownies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a 9x9-inch baking pan.
In a microwave-safe bowl, melt the butter. Add the sugar and stir until well combined.
Add the eggs one at a time, stirring well after each addition. Stir in the vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, stirring until just combined.
If desired, stir in the chopped nuts.
Pour the batter into the prepared baking pan and spread it evenly.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out with a few moist crumbs.
Allow the brownies to cool completely in the pan before cutting into squares.
Serve and enjoy these delicious and simple homemade brownies!
